title: Comment: Small Android phones are dead – Get a Pixel 5 while you still can
content:
Small Android phones are dead. As sad as it is to say, it’s extremely unlikely that a flagship Android phone will come out in the foreseeable future. Let’s go over why.

more…

The post Comment: Small Android phones are dead – Get a Pixel 5 while you still can appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: There's a few loud voices pushing for small Android phones to come back to the flagship market, but they're dead at this point. Here's why.
